description: Enjoy a warm Merino/polyester blend that helps move sweat, dries quickly, and hold its shape during high-sweat activities in colder weather with Smartwool's Men's Merino Sport 250 Henley. It's one ofSmartwool's most stylish tops, but also one ofSmartwool's best base layers for performance—designed to maximize comfort and minimize chafing as you explore easily with a pack on your back.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 250 Henley - Mens
